title: A Brotherly Valentine
description: Eighteen-year-old Adam plans to lose his virginity on Valentine's Day.His anonymous hookup, V, is a fellow virgin who sounds like the perfect match, even though he has no idea what he looks like. The thing that makes them both compatible? They have forbidden feelings for their brothers.With the big day here and the house to himself, V comes over. While he’ll never live up to the perfection that is Aaron, Adam’s twin brother, this is still destined to be a hot encounter.But what starts as hot soon turns scorching as V reveals himself and Adam’s hookup turns into the biggest, sweetest, and sexiest surprise of his life.And a taboo one that no one can ever know about.A Brotherly Valentine is a 6,200-word short story.
author: Rhett Blue
